test_cases.name: should render without crashing
test_cases.description: Verifies component renders with empty props

test_cases.name: should render with empty records array
test_cases.description: Displays basic UI elements with no data

test_cases.name: should display zero total calls when records array is empty
test_cases.description: Shows 0 for total calls when no tool calls exist

test_cases.name: should display N/A or 0% success rate when no tool calls exist
test_cases.description: Handles empty state for success rate calculation

test_cases.name: should show empty table or 'No tool calls' message
test_cases.description: Displays appropriate message when no data

test_cases.name: should count single tool call correctly
should count multiple tool calls correctly
test_cases.description: Aggregates total calls from multiple tool_use blocks

test_cases.name: should count successful tool calls when is_error is false
test_cases.description: Tracks success count based on is_error flag

test_cases.name: should count failed tool calls when is_error is true
test_cases.description: Tracks failure count when is_error is true

test_cases.name: should count both success and failure correctly
should display 100% success rate when all calls succeed
should display 0% success rate when all calls fail
test_cases.description: Shows 0% when all calls have errors

test_cases.name: should display 50% success rate when half succeed
test_cases.description: Calculates percentage correctly for mixed results

test_cases.name: should display rounded percentage for partial success rates
test_cases.description: Rounds success rate to appropriate decimal places (66.67%)

test_cases.name: should display table header with Tool Name, Calls, Errors columns
test_cases.description: Renders breakdown table with proper column headers

test_cases.name: should list each unique tool name in the table
test_cases.description: Shows distinct tool names in breakdown

test_cases.name: should display correct call count for each tool
test_cases.description: Aggregates calls per tool name (e.g., Read: 2, Write: 1)

test_cases.name: should display correct error count for each tool
should show 0 errors for tools that never failed
test_cases.description: Shows 0 in error column for successful tools

test_cases.name: should sort tools by name alphabetically
should handle tool_result with missing is_error field
test_cases.description: Treats missing is_error as success (undefined handling)

test_cases.name: should handle very large number of tool calls
should handle tools with special characters in name
test_cases.description: Displays tool names with special characters correctly

test_cases.name: should handle mixed content with text and tool blocks
test_cases.description: Filters tool_use from mixed ContentBlock arrays

test_cases.name: should handle duplicate tool_use IDs gracefully
test_cases.description: Does not crash on duplicate IDs

test_cases.name: should accept TranscriptRecord array as records prop
should update display when records prop changes
should display total calls in a card with proper styling
test_cases.description: Uses Tailwind CSS for card styling

test_cases.name: should display success rate in a separate card
test_cases.description: Shows success rate with proper formatting

test_cases.name: should use Tailwind CSS classes for styling
test_cases.description: Verifies Tailwind utility classes are applied

should count tool calls from multiple assistant messages
should display zero total calls when records have no tool_use blocks
should have proper structure with cards and table
should compile without type errors for valid TranscriptRecord array
should return zero stats for empty array
test_cases.description: Returns default zero values for empty input

test_cases.name: should return zero stats when records have no tool_use blocks
should count single tool_use correctly
should count multiple tool_use blocks in single message
test_cases.description: Counts multiple tool_use in one message

test_cases.name: should count tool_use across multiple messages
should count successful tool call when is_error is false
should count failed tool call when is_error is true
should count both success and failures correctly
should treat missing is_error as success
should handle tool_use without matching tool_result
should return 100 when all calls succeed
should return 0 when all calls fail

changes: Created new GitHub Actions workflow for frontend tests
Added test execution step with npm test
Added coverage report step with npm run test:coverage
Added code coverage upload to Codecov
Configured workflow to run on push and PR to main/master/develop branches
Set up Node.js 20 with npm cache
Added linting and type checking steps

notes: Tests are currently FAILING as expected (TDD Red Phase)
Component file src/components/StatsSummary.tsx needs to be created
Utility file src/utils/statsCalculator.ts needs to be created
Tests expect TranscriptStats interface with: totalCalls, successCount, failureCount, successRate, byTool[]
byTool array items should have: name, count, errors
Success rate should be rounded to 2 decimal places (e.g., 66.67)
Tools should be sorted alphabetically in the breakdown table
Missing is_error field should be treated as success (false)
Component should use Tailwind CSS for styling
Component should display statistics in cards and a table
Coverage threshold is 70% as configured in vitest.config.ts
